symptoms.name: Duck noises
symptoms.notes: Quack quack! Treated with a tangled string of fairy lights or the human hair of a punk.

symptoms.name: Horns
symptoms.notes: Pointy things emanating from the skull. Highly dangerous. Rub on baby pee to cure.

symptoms.name: Lizard tail
symptoms.notes: Upsets patient's sense of balance. Treat with llama flesh, or administer a fat doob.

symptoms.name: Terrible moustache
symptoms.notes: When no razor is available, use a rodent paste or the juice of one toad.

symptoms.name: Laser eyes
symptoms.notes: Will burn through solid steel. Apply syphilitic ants to eyes immediately.

symptoms.name: Short legs
symptoms.notes: Easily cured by insects in any form.

symptoms.name: CONSTANT SHOUTING
symptoms.notes: Shut the patient up by placing a Santa hat on their head. Also had luck with a fat doob and llama meat.

symptoms.name: Chronic pooping
symptoms.notes: Cure patient ASAP by applying mullet hair to the affected area.

symptoms.name: Elongated tongue
symptoms.notes: A short burst of pug wrinkles has proven to retract the tongue.

symptoms.name: Firebreathing
symptoms.notes: Can occur after eating very spicy food. Apply rag over mouth to cure - also treated by toad or armadillo testicles.

symptoms.name: Botty burps
symptoms.notes: Parp! Either human mullet hair or lizard poop should do the trick here.

symptoms.name: Invisible hands
symptoms.notes: Place leeches on the forearms to stimulate reappearance and extremities.

symptoms.name: Walking backwards
symptoms.notes: Rub donkey poop into the feet for an effecive cure.

symptoms.name: Green hair
symptoms.notes: Common in patients exposed to nuclear waste. Cure by applying Platypus blood or Mouse paste under the tongue.

symptoms.name: Termite infestation
symptoms.notes: Syphilitic ants or other insects should see these nasty critters off.

symptoms.name: On fire
symptoms.notes: Cured by the loving embrace only a mother can provide.
